message.content:
cs.IT, cs.AR, cs.EM, cs.DS, cs.SY 

Reasoning: 
- cs.IT (Information Theory) is the most likely category as the paper focuses on the metric sorter unit of successive cancellation list decoders for polar codes, which is a topic related to information theory. 
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) is also likely as the paper discusses the hardware implementation of the decoder and proposes new architectures for the metric sorter unit. 
- cs.EM (Electromagnetics) is less likely but still possible as the paper may involve electromagnetic considerations in the design of the hardware implementation. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also possible as the paper proposes new architectures for the metric sorter unit, which involves algorithmic considerations. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is less likely but still possible as the paper may involve control systems considerations in the design of the hardware implementation.
